reutilities.configuration.title: §6§l[Reutilities]§r Settings
reutilities.configuration.rendering.tool: Settings related to rendering of Reutilities' features.
reutilities.configuration.item.tooltip: Settings related to items (or its tooltips) added or changed by Reutilities.
config.reutilities.render_outfits.toolti:
Whether to render outfits on your player model and first-person hand.
Disabling this makes the rendering fall back to vanilla.
config.reutilities.render_outfit_on_hand: Whether to render outfits in the "chest" slot in your first-person hand.
Whether to render chestplates in your first-person hand.
config.reutilities.light_emitting_emissi: Whether light-emitting blocks should be emissive based on their light level.
config.reutilities.show_components_with_: Whether to display an item's data components when holding Alt.
config.reutilities.line_breaks_on_compon: Whether component display on tooltips should have line breaks.
logger.reutilities.outfit_definition.wro: Tried finding the outfit slot for non-armor slot '%s'
